SEARCH

Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingMachine
public class VendingMachine extends Object
This class represents a vending machine that sells books to customers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    VendingMachine(double locationFactor, String password)
    Constructs a VendingMachine object with the specified location factor and password.

  • Constructor Details

    • VendingMachine

      public VendingMachine(double locationFactor, String password)
      Constructs a VendingMachine object with the specified location factor and password.
      Parameters:
      locationFactor - The factor used to calculate book prices based on location.
      password - The password required by seller for certain operations.

  • Method Details

    • getCassette

      public int getCassette()
      Retrieves the total value of coins inserted into the vending machine.
      Returns:
      Total value of coins inserted.

    • insertCoin

      public void insertCoin(int coin)
      Inserts a coin into the vending machine. Coins are added to the cassette.
      Parameters:
      coin - The value of the coin to be inserted.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the coin denomination is not acceptable.

    • cancel

      public int cancel()
      Cancels the transaction and returns the total value of coins inserted.
      Returns:
      Total value of coins inserted before cancellation.

    • restock

      public void restock(List<Book> books, String password)
      Restocks the vending machine with a new stock of books.
      Parameters:
      books - The list of books to be restocked.
      password - The password required to restock the vending machine.
      Throws:
      InvalidPasswordException - If the provided password is incorrect.

    • emptySafe

      public int emptySafe(String password)
      Empties the safe and returns the total revenue stored.
      Parameters:
      password - The password required to empty the safe.
      Returns:
      Total revenue stored in the safe before emptying.
      Throws:
      InvalidPasswordException - If the provided password is incorrect.

    • getCatalogue

      public List<String> getCatalogue()
      Retrieves the catalogue of books available for sale.
      Returns:
      The list of book titles in the vending machine's shelf.

    • getPrice

      public int getPrice(int index)
      Retrieves the price of a book at the specified index in the vending machine's shelf.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the book in the vending machine's shelf.
      Returns:
      The price of the book.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the specified index is out of bounds.

    • buyBook

      public Book buyBook(int index)
      Allows a customer to buy a book from the vending machine.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the book to be bought in the vending machine's shelf.
      Returns:
      The book that was bought.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the specified index is out of bounds.
      CassetteException - If there are insufficient funds in the cassette to buy the book.
